data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Duwal, Ram Keshari, Jung, Sunghoon, Lee, Seunghwan (2014): Review of Europiella Reuter (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Miridae: Phylinae: Phylini) from Korea, with a description of a new genus. Zootaxa 3795 (3): 383-393, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3795.3.9
